author: Wayne Gretzky
quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
moreQuotes: A good hockey player plays where the puck is. A great hockey player plays where the puck is going to be
When you win, say nothing, when you lose say less
I get a feeling about where a teammate is going to be. A lot of times, I can turn and pass without even looking

author: Charles Swindoll
quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
moreQuotes: Anything under God's control is never out of control
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children

author: Henry David Thoreau
quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
moreQuotes: Be not simply good, be good for something
It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it

author: Nelson Mandela
quote: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world
moreQuotes: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
What counts in life is not the mere fact that we have lived. It is what difference we have made to the lives of others
It is in your hands, to make a better world for all who live in it

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower
moreQuotes: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life
Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice
